property.name: masterbrand
property.label: Masterbrand
property.description: Logo URL for masterbrand, leave empty to keep NSW Government Waratah logo.

property.name: srMasterbrandLabel
property.label: Screenreader masterbrand label
property.description: Label used on screenreaders for the masterbrand logo.

property.name: siteTitle
property.label: Site title
property.description: Provides user context of the product or service.

property.name: siteDescriptor
property.label: Site descriptor
property.description: Provides user context of the cluster/department/agency if required.

property.name: headerUrl
property.label: Home page URL
property.description: URL to alternative home page, leave blank otherwise.

property.name: mobile
property.label: Mobile
property.description: Show a responsive menu on mobile.

property.name: mobileLogoStacking
property.label: Mobile logo stacking
property.description: Stacking direction of the masterbrand and logo on mobile.

property.name: search
property.label: Show search bar
property.description: Provide user with easy access to a targeted search.

property.name: profileIpName
property.label: Profile integration procedure name
property.description: Name of the Integration procedure mapping content to profile menu. Leave empty for if no profile menu is required.

property.name: profileInputJSON
property.label: Profile input JSON
property.description: JSON formatted input parameters for the profile integration procedure.

property.name: profileOptionsJSON
property.label: Profile options JSON
property.description: JSON formatted options for the Profile integration procedure.

property.name: menuLabel
property.label: Menu icon name
property.description: Name of the Google Material icon used to render the menu waffle on mobile.

property.name: searchLabel
property.label: Screenreader search label
property.description: Accessibility label used for the search box with screen readers

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
